change_image.description: Changes the particle data to a configurable image (file or url)

converge_circle.description: Particles are attracted towards their position on an HSV color wheel centered around the center of the screen

converge_point.description: Particles are attracted towards the center of the screen

dummy.description: An effect that has no effect - useful to extend the timeline length without having anything happen

flickr_image.description: Changes the underlying image to one loaded from Flickr's recent images feed

hue_displace.description: Particles move into different directions depending on their hue

particle_displace.description: Displaces all particles into a certain direction by the same distance

particle_size_by_hue.description: Particles will have different sizes depending on their color

particle_spacing.description: Adds or removes space between particles

particles_reduce.description: Drops the given amount of particles

reset_default_image.description: This effect changes the currently active image back to the default image (i.e. what came from the server or was uploaded by the user)

smear.description: Smears the image in a circular way

smooth_trails.description: Enables an smoother fading image echo

sparkle.description: Particle size and brightness increase randomly

vignette.description: Fade out the edges to make it look like an old CRT TV

wave.description: A wave passes through the particles from left to right over the screen

webcam.description: Make use of the user's webcam as the particles' color values

weblinks.default_image: Default image by Edgar Degas (Wikimedia Commons)
